title: My pixel 3 XL won't pick up the Bluetooth for my 2010 Ford Fusion
content: Just bought a Google Pixel 3 XL and I found out it won't connect via Bluetooth sync to my 2010 Ford Fusion. My previous phone, a LG V20 would connect without any issues but the car's Bluetooth address won't even appear when searching for addresses.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
